mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE( ( SELECT chat_seq FROM ( SELECT chat_seq FROM chat_member WHERE chat_seq IN ( SELECT chat_seq FROM chat_member GROUP BY chat_seq HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT member_email) = 2 ) GROUP BY chat_seq HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT member_email) = 2 AND SUM(CASE WHEN member_email = #{email1} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 AND SUM(CASE WHEN member_email = #{email2} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ), 0 ) AS chat_seq FROM dual
select count(*) from chat_member where chat_seq = #{chat_seq} and member_email = #{email}
select count(*) from chat_member where chat_seq = #{chat_seq}
